name: It's A Steal!
description:
"It's A Steal" is a game about you trying to buy 2 products together that you have an insurmountable desire seeing as they're such good bargains.

This is a game for the Random Theme Generator jam, where the theme was "Steal Insurmountable Odds Together". I broke down the theme to it's barest components and found out every single definition for each word before beginning.  As such, here's my breakdown:

  • Steal: Bargain - you're trying to buy something in an auction
  • Insurmountable: You can't not get you're hands on these bargains
  • Odds: Bids go up randomly. 
  • Together: Two products at the same time

Anyways, yeah, give this a go. I'm sure you'll hate it and find it as boring as I do (I'm good at selling this, aren't I?)
